item.title: Beware of Identical Service Selectors
item.description: Label selectors on your Kubernetes Services should generally be unique. The Kubernetes Service docs outline occasions when selectors might not apply. But if you use selectors, you want each Service to select a unique backend. Otherwise, your traffic may not route properly Case Study 50% of routine HTTP requests failed to reach the target backend inside of a Kubernetes cluster. HTTP requests for resources likehttp://integration-tachyon/images/headshot.jpg never arrived at the backend for integration-tachyon.
